title: It's Okay (괜찮아요)
lyrics: eokkaega mugeomna yo mugeoun jimeul naeryeo nokiga cham swipjin an chyo nugunga malhaet jyo nae kkumi meolge man neukkyeojil ttaen jamsi swida gase yo maeil gateun ilsange himdeunga yo geugeon nugureul wihan geo jyo gyeolguk tto sseureojil tende himdeu reo honjara neukkyeojil ttae i norael deureobwa yo gidaehae jeulgyeo deutdeon geu mello di (Woo woo) radioe heulleonaol geu mokso ri Oh naega hal su inneun geon norae gasappunij yo himdeureo do jaldoel geoyeyo I believe in you
